name: Ice to Meet You
description:
Chase the SS Safety, using a freeze ray to create ice floes & keep yourself out of the freezing water.

Instructions:

A/Space to jump

R1/LMB to fire freeze ray

Jump onto crates to recharge your freeze ray

Created by:

Chris McHugh - Code

Kasper Arnklit - 3D Art

Keith O'Malley - Audio, 3D art, code
